name: miniflux
description: Miniflux is a minimalist self-hosted RSS feed reader focused on performance and simplicity. It features a clean UI, keyboard shortcuts, API access, and supports external integrations like Fever and APIs.
features: Feed management: Subscribe to RSS and Atom feeds with automatic updates and error handling for broken sources.
Keyboard shortcuts: Navigate and manage articles using vim-style keyboard commands for efficient reading workflow.
Read later: Save articles for offline reading or integration with Pocket, Instapaper, and Wallabag services.
Full-text scraping: Extract complete article content from feeds that only provide summaries or excerpts.
Fever API: Connect mobile RSS readers and third-party clients using the Fever-compatible API protocol.
Article filtering: Create rules to automatically mark, star, or hide articles based on keywords and patterns.
OPML import: Migrate feed subscriptions from other readers using standard OPML export files.
Minimal interface: Read articles in a distraction-free layout optimized for speed and content focus.
